description: '''Djent''' ({{IPAc-en|dʒ|ɛ|n|t}}) is a subgenre of [[progressive metal]], termed for an [[onomatopoeia]] of the guitar sound that characterizes it. While sources such as ''[[The Guardian]]'' and ''[[Guitar World]]'' describe djent as a [[Music genre|genre]], some notable musicians including [[Randy Blythe]] ([[Lamb of God (band)|Lamb of God]]) and [[Stephen Carpenter]] ([[Deftones]]) say it is not.
